Package ca.utoronto.utm.assignment1.othello

package ca.utoronto.utm.assignment1.othello
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Move
    Capture a Move.
    Othello
    Capture an Othello game.
    OthelloBoard
    Keep track of all of the tokens on the board.
    OthelloController
    The OthelloController is an abstract class containing all the basics for an Othello game.
    OthelloControllerHumanVSGreedy
    An OthelloControllerHumanVSGreedy is an OthelloController.
    OthelloControllerHumanVSHuman
    An OthelloControllerHumanVSHuman is an OthelloController.
    OthelloControllerHumanVSRandom
    An OthelloControllerHumanVSRandom is an OthelloController.
    OthelloControllerRandomVSGreedy
    An OthelloControllerRandomVSGreedy is an OthelloController.The goal here is to print out the probability that Random wins and Greedy wins as a result of playing 10000 games against each other with P1=Random and P2=Greedy.
    OthelloControllerRandomVSRandom
    An OthelloControllerRandomVSRandom is an OthelloController.
    OthelloRandomProbability
    The OthelloRandomProbability class simulates probabilities of two computers, P1 and P2, playing Othello with random strategies.
    Player
    The Player is an abstract class that defines the basics of a player for an Othello game.
    PlayerGreedy
    PlayerGreedy makes a move by considering all possible moves that the player can make.
    PlayerHuman
    Represents a Human player in the Othello game.
    PlayerRandom
    PlayerRandom makes a move by first determining all possible moves that this player can make, putting them in an ArrayList, and then randomly choosing one of them.
